title: Veganic To Go
typeOfFood: Vegan, International, Japanese, Macrobiotic, Organic, Raw, Western, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Asian, Fusion
description: A 100% vegan cafe uses high quality ingredients with 60-100% being organic. Dishes include brown rice lunch plate and a made-in-house bun & patty vegan burger. Relaxing atmosphere. MSG free, GMO free, microwave free, artificial chemicals free. (Veganic = Vegan, Organic, Macrobiotic)
